为了帮您压缩视频，我们需要访问您的相册。请在设置中授权后重新打开应用。: To compress your videos, we need access to your photo library. Please grant permission in Settings and reopen the app.
请前往iOS设置 > 隐私与安全性 > 照片 > 视频瘦身器 > 选择\"所有照: Go to iOS Settings > Privacy & Security > Photos > Video Slimmer > select "All Photos"
推荐 • 保持高画质，适度压缩: Recommended • Keep high quality with moderate compression
无法保存压缩视频到相册，请检查相册权限和存储空间: Unable to save compressed videos to Photos. Please check photo permissions and storage space.
已保存压缩视频并删除原视频: Compressed videos saved and original videos deleted
无法重新压缩视频，请稍后重试: Unable to re-compress videos. Please try again later.
确定要取消正在压缩的视频吗？\\n当前进度将丢失。: Are you sure you want to cancel this compression?\nCurrent progress will be lost.
确定要从队列中移除这个视频吗？: Remove this video from the queue?
确定要停止所有压缩任务吗？\\n正在进行的压缩将被取消，进度将丢失。: Stop all compression tasks?\nOngoing compression will be cancelled and progress will be lost.
当前压缩任务尚未完全结束或已有压缩结果。\\n退出后将无法在此页面继续查看和管理: Compression is not fully finished or there are results.\nAfter exiting you cannot manage this task on this page.
